'''Adidas AG''' is a German multinational apparel and footwear corporation. On several occasions, the company has collaborated with Minecraft, releasing specialized items and releases on the [[Marketplace]].

{{Empty section}}

== Marketplace releases ==

=== adidas Adventurers ===
{{Main|adidas Adventurers Add-On}}
Released on June 3, 2025, adidas Adventurers is an add-on dedicated to various Adidas products, providing various buffs such as [[haste]].<ref>{{Mcnet|adidas-x-minecraft|adidas x Minecraft|June 3, 2025|[[Cristina Anderca]]}}</ref>

=== Three Stripes City ===
{{Main|Three Stripes City}}
Released on November 18, 2025, Three Stripes City is a [[dynamic world]] themed around Adidas.<ref>{{Mcnet|three-stripes-city|adidas x Minecraft returns|November 18, 2025|[[Cristina Anderca]]}}</ref>
